Mastère en Assurance, Banque et Finance: Master in Insurance, Banking and Finance
Ce Master vise à offrir: This Master aims to offer the theoretical bases and the tools necessary for the Management of Markets and Capital. It predisposes to a good understanding of issues related to financial markets and products. Thus, this Master aims to train specialists capable of evolving in all trades of the financial markets and exercising their skills at the service of banks and investment firms, asset management companies, consulting firms, investment companies. insurance or large companies.
Emet des ordres: Issues orders for the placement, purchase and sale of stock market products (rates, securities, etc.) on the nancial markets under the control of the Autorité des Marchés Financiers -AMF- and in accordance with financial legislation.
Peut exectuer: Can manage a portfolio of financial assets. May carry out compliance control of operations / transactions.
Organise le suivi: Organizes the monitoring, control and recording of transactions carried out on the nancial markets (foreign exchange, securities, etc.) according to the quality procedures of the institution to which it belongs and the banking and financial regulations.
Peut définir les procédures: May define procedures for processing market transactions. Can carry out quality monitoring of administrative procedures.
Optimiser le rendement: Optimizing the performance of portfolios made up of financial assets on behalf of third parties (companies, individuals, institutions) or for the company to which they belong, under the control of the Autorité des Marchés Financiers -AMF- and according to the legislation.
Accueillie: Welcomed and guides the clientele physically and by telephone; informs customers about basic banking and insurance product services. Performs day-to-day counter operations according to the rules and instructions for the safety of people and goods.
Peut réaliser le suivi: Can monitor the cash needs of the structure. Advises and guides a clientele of individuals / individuals in the choice of investment investments to build or optimize their financial assets according to banking and financial regulations.
Etudie et rend avis: Studies and gives opinions or decisions on applications for individual or business loans (real estate, consumption, etc.) and assesses the risks associated with their granting according to the establishment's overall commercial and financial strategy and banking regulations.
Peut élaborer des supports contractuels,: Can develop contractual supports, follow up on insurance contracts linked to loans.
Réalise l'étude, la conception et la mis: Carry out the study, design and marketing of banking products according to the strategy and overall commercial offer of the bank and banking regulations.
Peut définir un plan média, rendre décis: Can define a media plan, make a decision on the granting of credits.
Différentes approches pédagogiques: Different pedagogical approaches will be adopted to make the learning experience more attractive and stimulating for learners. As such, the following examples of active pedagogies are cited:
Métiers visés et perspectives profession: Targeted professions and professional perspectives of the course
Gestion back et middle-office marchés fi: Back and middle-office financial market management
Conception et expertise produits bancair: Design and expertise of banking and financial products.
À la fin de la formation, les participan: At the end of the training, participants should be able to
Methodologie de rédaction d'un rapport d: Methodology for writing an internship report
Evaluer la solvabilité d'un créditeur et: Evaluate the solvency of a creditor and the risks
Vérifier la rentabilité d'un crédit pour: Check the profitability of a loan for a bank
Suivre des évolutions boursières et indi: Follow stock market developments and benchmarks
Établir une courbe d'évolution de produi: Establish an evolution curve for financial products
Montrer une attitude positive envers l’a: Show a positive attitude towards the adoption of new pedagogical approaches.
Prendre systématiquement des initiatives: Systematically take initiatives to realize your creative ideas.
S’engager activement et être responsable: Actively engage and be responsible in the implementation of the project to achieve the set objectives.
Démontrer une capacité à travailler à la: Demonstrate an ability to work both individually and in a team.
Licences admises pour l'accès au mastère: Licenses admitted for access to the master's degree
Licence en Gestion mention finance: Bachelor in Management with a focus on finance.
Licence en Gestion mention Comptabilité: License in Management with specialization in Accounting.
Licence en informatique appliqué à la ge: Bachelor's degree in computer science applied to management.
Diplome dépassant trois années d'etudes: Diploma exceeding three years of study after the baccalaureate.
Possibilité de donner des cours pour dif: Possibility to give lessons for different levels and to provide educational support.
Possibilité de faire de la recherche dan: Possibility of doing research in Tunisian and foreign units and laboratories.
Possibilité de faire de la recherche app: Possibility of doing applied research in business.
Formation initiale, Formation continue,: Initial training, Continuing training, Work-study training
Stage professionnel et mémoire de fin d’: Professional internship and end of studies thesis
Descriptif des stages et des activités p: Description of internships and practical end-of-study activities
Le mémoire ou le rapport de stage de mas: The master's thesis or internship report must relate to a topical subject not exceeding the
étudiant doit montrer: The student must demonstrate mastery of a research methodology. The defense will take place after the acceptance of the follower teacher as well as the manager in the company and the opinion of the masters committee.
Le stage est réalisé au sein d’un: The internship is carried out within a
cabinet d’expertise comptable ou d’audit: accounting or auditing firm or with a corporate accounting and finance department.
Chaque étudiant est suivi: Each student is supervised by a teacher from the teaching team with a Master's degree. The person in charge of the grade ensures that the internship follow-ups are equitably distributed among the members of the teaching team.
De la même: Likewise, the host company must designate a manager for the intern in the company. The internship gives rise to the drafting of a report, the form and substance of which are denied by the person in charge of the specialty. The report is the subject of an oral defense before a jury composed of the following teacher as well as the manager in the company. If the person in charge of the company is prevented for the defense, the company sends a detailed opinion on the work accomplished by the trainee. He is replaced for the defense by another member of the teaching team.
issue de la soutenance: At the end of the defense, the jury awards the candidate a mark taking into consideration the intern's work in the company, the quality of the report presented as well as the quality of the defense.
Inter liaisons entre les semestres du pa: Inter links between the semesters of the course, gateways (to be specified), evaluation and progression
Le master articule sur trois: The master is structured over three semesters and one semester to carry out the internship and the internship report (report 'thesis, business plan, ...) The duration is two years (M1, M2) The student must pass the first year for enrolling in the second year The assessment system for the national master's degree is based on continuous assessment and end-of-semester exams. The courses provided for in each unit are sanctioned by examinations comprising written, oral or practical tests depending on the nature of the unit. The said tests are organized in two sessions:
Une session principale: A main session at the end of each semester, the date of which is limited by the director of the institute, after consulting the scientific council. A catch-up session open to the prot of students declared not admitted during the main session This session will take place at least one week after the announcement of the results of the main session at the end of the academic year for the M1 and just after the third semester for the M2. Any student who has obtained an average equal to or greater than 10/20 in each module of the year of study concerned is admitted for the transition from one year to another. However, the marks obtained in the different modules of the year of study concerned can be complemented by each other, and declared any student having obtained the general average. the main session only retakes the tests relating to the modules in which they obtained an average of less than 10/20. During the remedial session, the student benefits, in each test, from the better of the two final marks obtained in the two examination sessions.
